snippet: Rafael Nadal is glad he won a ninth Monte Carlo Masters title the hard way, after defeating Frenchman Gael Monfils 7-5, 5-7, 6-0 in an error-strewn final Sunday....
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal is glad he won a ninth Monte Carlo Masters title the hard way, after defeating Frenchman Gael Monfils 7-5, 5-7, 6-0 in an error-strewn final Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Rafael Nadal Glad He Won 9th Monte Carlo Title the Hard Way
headline.main: Rafael Nadal Glad He Won 9th Monte Carlo Title the Hard Way
